name: Tennis Online Duel
description:
Have you ever stepped onto a tennis court with the intention of playing? Then you must be in love with the graceful movement of the racket and the sound of the bouncing ball. For all tennis lovers, we have developed an online game with an absolute sense of presence, a physical ball and a new technique for hitting the ball - you really push and spin, smash and volley - with your hand.
Tennis Online Duel is a realistic first person tennis game - you hit the ball using a common mouse and feel the racket in your hand. Play with your friends or someone random across the internet. Smash, slice - everything is real. Tennis Online Duel is developed to make you feel as a player - it is not about watching, it's not a simulator - it is a Game.
